talk.author: did:plc:ecfyuszb5ibchxdq3niqkhxi
talk.utter: And many in the scientific community also dish misinformation and lies. We saw this during Covid and in the AGW camp. Disagreement isn't tolerated . Clean your house, then we can talk.

talk.author: did:plc:hjypvroqy64n3tnps3ojdmzm
talk.utter: Before you get blocked, maybe you should regale us with the many papers and journals backing your stance?

talk.author: did:plc:ecfyuszb5ibchxdq3niqkhxi
talk.utter: I don't pander to anonymous bullies.

talk.author: did:plc:ecfyuszb5ibchxdq3niqkhxi
talk.utter: I don't pander to anonymous bullies.

talk.author: did:plc:hjypvroqy64n3tnps3ojdmzm
talk.utter: Maybe m reading your post wrong? Are you talking about the JRE type grifters that people need to look out for as opposed to actually credible scientists?

talk.author: did:plc:ecfyuszb5ibchxdq3niqkhxi
talk.utter: Many legitimate scientists have had their voices stifled in global warming, pandemic disease, and other fields. Careers have been destroyed for not agreeing with the current "truth". People protect their power and funding. Especially true when the funding is based on supporting the current "truth".

talk.author: did:plc:ecfyuszb5ibchxdq3niqkhxi

talk.author: did:plc:hjypvroqy64n3tnps3ojdmzm
talk.utter: Look up the words scientific consensus and get back to us.

talk.author: did:plc:ecfyuszb5ibchxdq3niqkhxi
talk.utter: You mean like the consensus by all those US intelligence leaders that swore the Russian hoax was real? That was their "consensus" and they were lying.
